pageProduct.name: OGX Coconut Miracle Oil Flexible Hold Hair Spray 177ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

OGX Coconut Miracle Oil Flexible Hold Hairspray indulge in an ultra-luxurious hairspray infused with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract to help hold and maintain soft, seductive control to finish any style you desire.

Size: 177mL

Shelf Life in Days: 730 days

Warnings

Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat., VA/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Noix de Coco) Oil Gardenia Tahitensis (Tiare/Tiare) Flower Extract, Vanilla Planifolia (VanillaNanille) Fruit Extract, PPG-12 Dimethicone, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triethyl Citrate, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Sorbitol, Calcium Stearate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Parfum/Fragrance, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin, Limonene.

Directions

What you do... Shake well before use. Finish style by spraying the product 20 - 25cm away on dry hair.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results use in conjunction with other OGX hair products.
